post.body: The company... I mean a hashtag thinking it can govern the policy of a major U.S. corp = Fail. I don't care about the #sourpuss
I think you should. There's always been a silent agreement that everyone will generally respect other's tags.
What are your thoughts about callin people "members?" Calling activist like myself "sour puss trolls?" or attacking Ford or @RNC
In the only role it's ever been used in: to group, tag, or categorize content so that it is visible to those who desire it.
I want my fellow Conservatives to LEARN social media, not become bots who just click my links and listen to me rant. cough #tcot
Oh brother. haha. It's all context my friend. It's okay to talk politics 24/7, it's not cool to make a hashtag the actual convo.
Yes sir. It is Saturday! Want to know a public secret? I gain followers when I talk about the true context of twitter. Truth :)
Also I could care less if you're Conservative or Liberal or even a Communist. I follow 463 awesome people, not who ppl tell me 2
Ya. I want to hear about your family, your experiences in life, I want you to tweet - I'm not looking for a Fox News echo. #tcot
However, that is the problem. You cant assign 1500 ppl to a directory who are self-identified "conservatives" + expect poli action
There's an exercise you can do. Look at the quality of the stream between a Conservat who has their bio up v. someone who has tcot
True. Now we're being used as leverage though. One thing is sure: the internet will gobble fads, but true advance will stay.
No problem. tcot bio lines are a speedbump in the movement and social engagement. I'm here to jam the gas.
I just stood up and clapped. There would be an entirely diff argument IF tcot had shown it was capable of being reflective.
That being said I would suggest that you make your bio relevant to your personality, instead of a hashtag. I want to know YOU.
There is a right and wrong when it comes to social media practices... let there be no doubt. Button-clicking isn't it. #tcot
@sanuzis Agreed. Thank God Dean isn't tweeting... and I do enjoy Saul's tweets. Let's not forget, this is politics... #rncchair
Morton Blackwell gets GOP and minority outreach, why don't most bloggers and operatives I talk to? or even call friend? #rebuild
Stats are way up on @americanresolve I'm glad to see it taking the shape that it is. It's worth the tight schedule between work + play. #TAR
I'm getting a lot of good feedback from the Scoble article I link. I'm also getting a number of people who are reading it entirely wrong.
